Package com.lexicalscope.eventcast

Interface Summary
EventCaster The event caster is responsible for broadcasting the events
EventCastingExceptionListener Implement this interface to be notified of exceptions that occur during event casting
EventCastModuleBuilder Bind listener interfaces to the EventCaster
EventCastUnhandledListener Implement this interface to be notified of events that are not handled by any listener
 

Class Summary
EventCast Factory for the EventCaster Register listener interfaces with the EventCaster using the module builder The module will detect if guice creates any instance that implements one of the registered interfaces The module will provide an implementation of the registered interface for injection If you call a method on the provided implementation, the same method will be called on every other implementation of the interface
